Mew Challenge Recap 8/25/02
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: MR3 Mayor's Cups: Mew Challenge Recap 8/25/02
By Velo on Sunday, August 25, 2002 - 06:58 pm:

Well, besides Winona, this was a fight between three AWESOME maxxed mews, the winner was hardly clear until near the end of the tournament.

Moo vs. Winona: After a missed scratch, a cat fan won the first round for Moo in one hit. The last two fights were also one-hit KOs against Winona, who had stats far lower than any of her competitors.

Moo 3, Winona 0

Minemi vs. Winona: Pretty much the same deal, Winona got a couplke of 1 damage hits in, but it was far from being enough to get even close to a win.

Minemi 3, Winona 0

Flo vs. Winona: Three moves, three KOs from Flo...setting a new record for the quickness of a match at 1 second.

Flo 3, Minmei 0

Moo vs. Minmei: In the first round, Minmei was acting like a winner. powerful combos of 10:10s and zaps left Moo shivering with a mere 5.1% remaining. Next, Minmei took it a step further and KO'd Moo with a 10:10 and an outrageous 510 zap. However...things in MR tourneys can change quickly. In round 3 Moo and Minmei duked it out with the smaller techs, all leading to a very close finish...in which Moo won by 10%. In round 4 Moo dominated with no mercy, unleashing two 450+ cat fans that left Minmei unconscious on the floor. In the final round, poor Fenrick had to watch as Minmei's best attacks missed...losing the match due to a 291 damage cat fan. Moo had won, but now he had FLo to contend with...

Moo 3, Minmei 2

Moo vs. Flo: We all thought this would be a close match like the last one. We were quite wrong. Flo went berserk like a Chucky doll in the first two rounds, constantly using meows and powerful zaps to get quick KOs. In round three, Moo threw all that he had at Flo, but Flo's high speed got in the way...dodging almost every single attack. Unfortunately for Moo, his speed could not save him from Flo's mighty meow.

Flo 3, Moo 0

Minmei vs. Flo: This match had a lot resting on it. If Minmei would win, there would be the first three-way tie in MR3 tourney history.
Round one started out looking like this would happen. Minmei went on a blocking spree, taking the hits with no damage done and dishing it out at Flo to boot, winning 68.7% to 32.5%. Round 2 was close...Flo hit a 511 10:10...but then Minmei countered with two zaps and won yet again. In round three, we were all anxiously awaiting the tie. We were denied. Flo worked it's zap magic to win round 3 and murdered Minmei with meows in round 4. It all came down to the fifth and final round...would Flo take home the gold, or could Minmei scratch out a win? Flo went crazy from the beginning, getting Minmei down to a mere 2.6% with meows and a cat fan. Minmei managed not to land a single tech.

Flo 3, Minmei 2

SO there you have it. All hail Flo! All hail TheDt! Be sure to catch the next mayors cup, the Metalner Day Challenge...it's gonna be a blast for sure! Good night ranchers!

By The D on Sunday, August 25, 2002 - 07:46 pm:

I think that Minmei was a great challenge there, and I had though flo would lose, but just did'nt give up, and turns out, Minmei had a flashback of a previous battle with Moo. Moo was a great Mew, considering the time it was raised in. Well, anyway, I think that this was a great tourey, with 3 great maxxed Mews. Although SS entered a E-Class monster, I respect him for at least entering. I hope you give me a challenge for Kalaragi challenge SS, so good luck on that.

So, nice recap, and until next tourney!
